TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 中使用类方法以使用任何数据操作后提供对业务对象实例的访问将执行控制和业务对象，而业务对象被销毁。The class is used in the method to provide access to the business object instance after any data operations that are using the control and business object are performed, but before the business object is destroyed. 使用访问业务对象属性。The business object is accessed using the property. 通过添加一个委托来处理事件，可以访问业务对象的任何公开的成员可以执行任何最后的工作或清理。By adding a delegate to handle the event, you can access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any final work or clean up. 方法不由调用控制，如果执行数据操作的方法是`static`方法。The method is not called by the control, if the method that performs data operations is a `static` method. 静态方法时，未不创建任何业务对象实例。No business object instance is created when the method is static. 控件公开可处理以在其生命周期中的不同时间使用基础业务对象的多个事件。The control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle. 下表列出了事件以及关联类和事件处理程序委托。The following table lists the events and the associated classes and event handler delegates. |事件Event|EventArgsEventArgs|EventHandlerEventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |。.

创建业务对象的实例前一刻发生。Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

创建业务对象的实例后立即发生。Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

在检索数据之前发生。Occurs before the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

执行插入、 更新或删除操作之前发生。Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.||| |

检索的数据后发生。Occurs after the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

插入、 更新或删除操作完成后发生。Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.||| |。.

在业务对象被销毁之前发生。Occurs before a business object is destroyed.||| ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件来显示信息。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例使用示例中间层业务对象。The second code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the first code example uses. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件来显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 您可能会处理是非常消耗 （大量的时间或资源） 为您的网页执行的每个数据操作创建的业务对象。You might work with a business object that is very expensive (in terms of time or resources) to create for every data operation that your Web page performs. 若要使用的高开销对象的一种方法可能是一次，创建它的一个实例并缓存而不是创建和销毁它为每个数据操作的后续操作。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. 此示例演示了此模式。This example demonstrates this pattern. 您可以处理事件首先，检查对象的缓存，然后创建一个实例，仅当尚未缓存。You can handle the event to check the cache for an object first, and then create an instance, only if one is not already cached. 然后，处理事件来缓存供将来使用，而不是销毁它的业务对象。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此示例中，的属性对象设置为`true`，以指示不要调用实例上的方法。In this example, the property of the object is set to `true`, to direct the to not call the method on the instance. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用的示例中间层业务对象。The following code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 通过定义的基本业务对象的代码示例包含`EmployeeLogic`类，该类是维护状态，并封装业务逻辑的类。The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a class that maintains state and encapsulates business logic. 有关完整的工作示例，您必须编译为一个库，此代码，然后使用这些类从 ASP 页。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library, and then use these classes from an ASP page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/northwindemployee16.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/northwindemployee16.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象表示 控件用来执行数据操作的业务对象。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the business object with which the control performs data operations.

value.span: 用来执行数据操作的业务对象；否则，如果将 传递给 ，则为 。

span.span: The business object the uses to data operations; otherwise, , if is passed to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据操作方法 (， ， ，和) 是实例方法，实例的业务对象之前执行的方法创建。If the data operation methods (, , , and ) are instance methods, an instance of the business object is created before the method is executed. 可以防止通过将保存在对象创建为每个调用的业务对象中的属性事件处理程序。You can prevent the business object from being created for each call by saving the object in the property in the event handler. 在后续事件，可以检索业务对象从属性。In subsequent events, you can retrieve the business object from the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件来显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 您可能会处理是非常消耗 （大量的时间或资源） 为您的网页执行的每个数据操作创建的业务对象。You might work with a business object that is very expensive (in terms of time or resources) to create for every data operation that your Web page performs. 若要使用的高开销对象的一种方法可能是一次，创建它的一个实例并缓存而不是创建和销毁它为每个数据操作的后续操作。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. 此示例演示了此模式。This example demonstrates this pattern. 您可以处理事件首先，检查对象的缓存，然后创建一个实例，仅当尚未缓存。You can handle the event to check the cache for an object first, and then create an instance, only if one is not already cached. 然后，处理事件来缓存供将来使用，而不是销毁它的业务对象。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此示例中，的属性类设置为`true`，以指示不要调用实例上。In this example, the property of the class is set to `true`, to direct the to not call on the instance. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)]
